homePage.title: Home
homePage.mainCopy: A minimal React/Flux starter app that uses:

technologies.name: React
technologies.info: A declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

technologies.name: Flux
technologies.info: An application architecture for React utilizing a unidirectional data flow.

technologies.name: React Router
technologies.info: A complete routing library for React.

technologies.name: Browserify
technologies.info: Lets you require('modules') in the browser by bundling up all of your dependencies.

aboutPage.title: About
aboutPage.mainCopy: Just another page to demonstrate routing.
